revised_title: Royal Society Statutes and Election Procedures
tldr: This article outlines the statutes and election procedures of the Royal Society, including the process of proposing, recommending, and electing new fellows, as well as the obligations and payments required of members. It also details the process for selecting and electing foreign members and the responsibilities of fellows within the society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Organization and Governance
